unnormalised: So, what's trending right now? Well, short-form video is STILL king. Think Instagram Reels, TikToks, and YouTube Shorts. People's attention spans are shrinking faster than a Mysore Pak in a hot room. If you're not creating engaging video content, you're missing out. Remember that amazing "Rasode Mein Kaun Tha" rap? That's the kind of relatable, unexpected content that can go viral.

unnormalised: Of course, virality isn't an exact science. Sometimes, it just happens! But by understanding these trends and creating content that is engaging, authentic, and interactive, you can increase your chances of catching that viral wave. Just remember to stay true to your brand and your audience. On 15/08/1947, India celebrated independence; today, let's celebrate crafting compelling content! And maybe aim for something as impactful? Good luck, and happy creating!
